cast.name: 艾丽西亚·K. 哈里斯 Alicia K. Harris

awards:
第26届全州国际电影节(2025)
　　国际电影竞赛单元 评审团大奖(提名)
introduction: Harvey is a young, straight, lonely, overweight man working in a chemistry lab. Shy and reserved, he watches people from a distance, longing for human contact. While browsing magazines in an adult video store, he stumbles upon Cherub, a gay review for ‘big men and their admirers’… With subtle touches, this debut feature film immerses us in a strangely muted world, radical in its absence of dialogue, yet gently hypnotic and fully embodied by its (anti)hero, portrayed with modesty by Benjamin Turnbull.
